__e: Is there nothing that Xena can't do?
Well, nor would I choose it, Father. But this Xena's left me no alternative.
When you look at her now what you see is what she would have become if Xena had not killed her family.
But even I know that Xena's there.
Xena? It's been awhile, hasn't it?
Look... I know what Xena did to you is a terrible thing.
They've agreed to let me take Xena and my son away from here.
I mean, Xena and I..., ...we care about you, and... I mean, I know it's kind of hard to tell sometimes.
Take me, take Xena, and let the people go.
